summary: Completed testing of document file upload feature with Storage Provider abstraction. All backend APIs (14/14 tests passing) and frontend UI functionality working correctly. LocalStorageProvider implementation verified.

issues: Minor: Recharts dimension warnings for chart width/height (-1) - cosmetic console warnings only

frontend_tests: Documents tab displays correctly with document count
Upload File button visible and clickable
Add by URL button visible and clickable
Upload dialog opens with all required fields
File upload zone with drag/click functionality
Verify buttons visible for Pending documents
Delete buttons visible for all documents
Download buttons visible for documents with files

critical_code_review_comments: Storage Provider abstraction is well-implemented with clear interfaces for Local, S3, and GCS providers
File validation (extension, size) properly implemented on backend
Frontend progress indicator simulates upload progress for better UX

test_credentials.note: Demo credentials shown on login page differ from provided test credentials (admin@mccare.global)

seed_data_creation: Test documents created during backend testing were cleaned up. Existing test candidate has 8 documents (6 URL-only, 2 with uploaded files).
context_for_next_testing_agent: Document upload feature fully tested with LocalStorageProvider. Backend test file at /app/backend/tests/test_document_upload.py can be reused for regression testing. Test candidate ID: d1c353f8-0dd6-4c2f-8a57-5fc0661647c9. Storage Provider abstraction ready for S3/GCS implementation when credentials available.

storage_provider_info.ready_for_cloud: S3StorageProvider and GCSStorageProvider classes implemented but require AWS/GCS credentials
